item.title: Running your Application as a Service on Pi Zero W
item.description: Daemonize your application so that it is easily started, stopped and resilient to crashes So you’ve got your headless Raspberry Pi Zero W all set up and you’ve been running applications you’ve written for yourself on it? I have, I’m using Go with a combination of Embd and Periph.io libraries to interact with the hardware on the Pi Zero W itself and external to it. But it feels clunky.
